title: World Map Path Finder
sub_title:
Pathfinding visualizer application that uses OpenStreetMap node geodata to find the shortest path between start and destination points on a real world map using a variety of path finding algorithms.

Plus a neaty visualizer for each algorithm. Built with Django DRF and React.

title: DevConnect
sub_title: Networking platform for student developers enabling collaboration and messaging at St John's University. Flask + React app.

title: Project Tracker / Issues Manager
sub_title: ASP.NET Core MVC app for managing projects, issues, and roles with Identity auth and policy-based authorization.
